project.description:
Following API: -suiteName, -configName, -firmwareVersionMain, suiteName - name of the predefined suite, e.g. Sanity440Lync_basic configName - name of the predefined session config, e.g. Sanity440LyncConfig firmwareVersionMain - name of the firmware file which should be test, e.g. UC430HD_2.0.3.16 1. Before running, put a firmware version to \\isr0214-34401\firmwares (isr0214-34401 = 10.59.0.87) , also it is need to put relevant firmwares for other phones. If tested firmware is UC440HD_3.0.0.65, it is need also to put all other available firmwares: UC430HD_3.0.0.65, UC420HD_3.0.0.65, UC405_3.0.0.65 (note that for 405 ther is no 'HD' in firmware name); 2. Example for run: tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl -suiteName Sanity440Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC440HD_3.0.0.65.img
Should work on 10.59.1.150 - ippSanityTest02

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ConfigName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Sanity or Full - The name should be Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl or Full440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
curl -s http://ippauto1/index.php/status/show.xml > show.xml type show.xml type show.xml | findstr status.free./status if ErrorLevel 1 Exit 1 set PATH=%PATH%;c:\cygwin\bin
set ARTIFACTORY=https://artifactory/api/storage/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB/3.0.1 if "%LASTBL%"=="None" ( curl -k -s -X GET %ARTIFACTORY% | findstr uri | cut -d"""" -f4 | grep -v artifactory | cut -c 2- | sort /R > LASTBL.txt set /P LASTBL=<LASTBL.txt more +1 LASTBL.txt > BeLASTBL.txt set /P BeLASTBL=<BeLASTBL.txt set COUNTER=0 )
:RunAgain set /A COUNTER=%COUNTER%+1 if %model%==405 ( set ImageName=UC%model%_%LASTBL%_ce4.img ) else ( set ImageName=UC%model%HD_%LASTBL%.img ) set Error=0 net use z: /DELETE net use z: \\10.59.0.87\Firmwares cd C:\IpPhoneAutomation\ATA curl -k -s -X GET %ARTIFACTORY%/%LASTBL%/440HD/UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img | grep uri | wc -l > 440HD.txt set /P 440HD=<440HD.txt
IF %440HD%==1 ( IF NOT EXIST z:\UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img curl -k -s -X GET %ARTIFACTORY%/%LASTBL%/440HD/UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img --output z:\UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img IF NOT EXIST z:\UC430HD_%LASTBL%.img curl -k -s -X GET %ARTIFACTORY%/%LASTBL%/430HD/UC430HD_%LASTBL%.img --output z:\UC430HD_%LASTBL%.img IF NOT EXIST z:\UC420HD_%LASTBL%.img curl -k -s -X GET %ARTIFACTORY%/%LASTBL%/420HD/UC420HD_%LASTBL%.img --output z:\UC420HD_%LASTBL%.img IF NOT EXIST z:\UC405_%LASTBL%_ce4.img curl -k -s -X GET %ARTIFACTORY%/%LASTBL%/405/UC405_%LASTBL%.img --output z:\UC405_%LASTBL%.img ) else set Error=1 if %Error%==0 tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName %ConfigName%%model%LyncConfig.tcl -suiteName %ConfigName%%model%Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain %ImageName% if ErrorLevel 1 set Error=1 if %Error%==1 ( echo Find Error set LASTBL=%BeLASTBL% if %COUNTER% EQU 1 goto RunAgain Exit 1 ) else ( echo Execute phase 2 tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName %ConfigName%%model%LyncConfig.tcl -suiteName %ConfigName%%model%overNight_phase2.suite -firmwareVersionMain %ImageName% if ErrorLevel 1 Exit 1 )
